channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Germaphobes, Rejoice! Airplane and Hospital Air Is Actually Pretty Clean, Study Claims
item.description: Researchers used face masks and an airplane air filter to find out what microbes are floating around.

item.title: Day One Ventures’ Masha Bucher on why every founder needs to be an influencer
item.description: Tech is racing ahead while society struggles to keep up. Masha Bucher, founder and GP of Day One Ventures, built her firm around closing that gap by combining venture capital with hands-on PR to help portfolio companies not just raise money, but actually break through the noise. Day One’s been an early backer of companies like World, Superhuman, and Remote.com, with 12 […]...

item.title: Capcom's Resident Evil Requiem marketing strategy has been strange, but we've finally got our first look at combat
item.description: Capcom's marketing of Resident Evil Requiem has been quite repetitive and mysterious, but that might be coming to an end with a new gameplay reveal.

item.title: Antigravity’s 360-degree drone is here to help you forget DJI
item.description: With DJI facing an imminent import ban in the US and its flagship drones disappearing from shelves, the new Antigravity A1 didn’t need to be a groundbreaking gadget to make headlines. It just needed to be a competent alternative that you can actually buy in the United States. In August, the Chinese brand couldn’t promise […]
